container.heading: State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Specialized Health Care Services — Organ Transplant Services

section.heading: Incorporation by Reference.
section.text: The State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Specialized Health Care Services — Organ Transplant Services is incorporated by reference.

annotations.annotation: Health-General Article, §§19-101 et seq., Annotated Code of Maryland
Regulation .01 repealed and new Regulation .01 adopted effective January 14, 1999 (26:1 Md. R. 23)
Regulation .01 amended effective February 7, 2000 (27:2 Md. R. 144)
Regulation .01 repealed and new Regulation .01 adopted effective April 15, 2002 (29:7 Md. R. 620)
Regulation .01 repealed and new Regulation .01 adopted effective February 27, 2017 (44:4 Md. R. 254)
